backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that defines and exposes a `MarketingContent` record (app name, tagline, features, CTA text) for 'Noxium AI' via a public query function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—the marketing landing page structure and the warm e-commerce visual theme—to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's component and page structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, accent, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Param Shopping app that preloads Sora and Inter fonts from Google Fonts and mounts the React app via `main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes SiteHeader, LandingPage, and SiteFooter into a full-height flex layout.
frontend/src/components/CTASection.tsx: Conversion-focused CTA section displaying a star rating, headline, primary/secondary action buttons, and App Store/Google Play download badges.
Responsive 3-column grid section that merges backend feature strings with icon-decorated cards and hover animations to highlight Param Shopping's key value propositions.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background banner image, animated headline/tagline using the app name and CTA text, dual action buttons, and a social proof emoji row.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, social media links, quick links, support links, and contact details in a responsive 4-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Renders a fixed top navigation header with the Param Shopping logo, nav links to page sections, and a Download CTA button.
frontend/src/components/WhyUsSection.tsx: Displays a 'Why Us' section with key stats (shoppers, products, uptime, rating), a hero image with a floating savings card, and a list of platform benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a useMarketingContent hook that fetches marketing content from the ICP backend actor via React Query, with a fallback default value when no actor is available.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes, using OKLCH color values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: React page component that fetches marketing content via `useMarketingContent` hook and renders Hero, Features, WhyUs, and CTA sections, with skeleton loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Sora, Inter), oklch-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for 'Param Shopping' (com.paramshopping.app) tracking schema version, existing features (landing page, visual theme), pending feature requests (dynamic backend content), and required image assets.
